title: Don't just stand there coughing
creator_credit: Craig Lahiff, Gus Howard, South Australian Film Corporation and Seethru Film Productions
brief_description: This film is designed to show the causes and effects of air pollution. It offers possible remedies to improve the quality of the air we breathe. Suitable for upper primary and secondary levels.
creator_credit_for_label: Craig Lahiff, Gus Howard, South Australian Film Corporation and Seethru Film Productions
